li.data-alt: PISD will remain closed for remainder of school year

div.p:
Letter from Mr. Marshall, Tuesday, April 21st, 2020.
English
Spanish

If your child is struggling with stress or anxiety during this time, PISD has counselors who are available to help. Please click the COUNSELING SERVICES link above, fill out the form, and someone will contact you.

div.p:
Palestine ISD is so thankful for the EAST TEXAS FOOD BANK and all it does to support our Weekend Backpack Program. Please visit their website to see how you can help with their great projects.

div.div: PISD will remain CLOSED for the remainder of the school year. For questions, please call your student's campus.
